game.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for keeping a player in the Ringzz game.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Theo Ruys en Arend Rensink, Richard, Julien
